name: @n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.sentimentAnalysis
description: Analyze the sentiment of your text

properties.name: inputText
properties.description: Use an expression to reference data in previous nodes or enter static text

properties.displayName: Sentiment scores are LLM-generated estimates, not statistically rigorous measurements. They may be inconsistent across runs and should be used as rough indicators only.
properties.name: detailedResultsNotice

options.name: categories
options.description: A comma-separated list of categories to analyze

options.name: systemPromptTemplate
options.default: You are highly intelligent and accurate sentiment analyzer. Analyze the sentiment of the provided text. Categorize it into one of the following: {categories}. Use the provided formatting instructions. Only output the JSON.
options.description: String to use directly as the system prompt template

options.name: includeDetailedResults
options.description: Whether to include sentiment strength and confidence scores in the output

options.name: enableAutoFixing
options.description: Whether to enable auto-fixing (may trigger an additional LLM call if output is broken)

options.name: batching
options.description: Batch processing options for rate limiting

options.name: batchSize
options.description: How many items to process in parallel. This is useful for rate limiting, but might impact the log output ordering.

options.name: delayBetweenBatches
options.description: Delay in milliseconds between batches. This is useful for rate limiting.
